    • saveBooking

      public ApiResponse saveBooking(UserBookingDto userBookingDto) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Saves a new booking in the database. Validates booking times, checks for overlapping bookings, and confirms the space availability.
      Specified by:
      saveBooking in interface BookingService
      Parameters:
      userBookingDto - DTO containing all necessary data for creating a new booking.
      Returns:
      ApiResponse indicating success or failure of the booking creation.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException

    • saveMultipleBookings

      public AddedResponse saveMultipleBookings(UserBookingDto[] bookingDtos) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Saves multiple bookings at once. Iterates over an array of UserBookingDto to save each booking.
      Specified by:
      saveMultipleBookings in interface BookingService
      Parameters:
      bookingDtos - Array of UserBookingDto containing booking details.
      Returns:

      jakarta.mail.MessagingException

    • findAvailableBookingHours

      public List<LocalTime> findAvailableBookingHours(SpaceEntity space, LocalDate date)
      Finds available booking hours within a day for a given space. Checks against existing bookings to determine open slots.
      Parameters:
      space - SpaceEntity for which to find available hours.
      date - LocalDate representing the day to check for availability.
      Returns:
      List of LocalTime representing available hours.
